title: My PBE account is disabled?
body:
I havent played on my PBE acount for like a week now and yesterday i tried to log into the account and it suddenly says this account is currently disabled.
Can you please help me how to fix this cause i want to try out the new champs.

My PBE account : christhejam

replies.body: Our account team can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can take a look into this with you individually.  See ya there!
